website_summaries.verdict: Choose this folding table and chair combination if you need a no-frills option with a small footprint.
pros: Basic folding table that comes with a chair
Pair doesn't take up much space, yet it provides ample room for a child to do a variety of activities
cons: Not ideal for larger or older children
Rare reports of damage upon delivery

customer_reviews.title: Perfect table for one
customer_reviews.text: This set is the perfect size for my child to do activites on her level instead of awkwardly adjusting herself to fit in adult chairs at adult tables. She's so very happy to have something to call her own to sit and create. I had no problem with the table nor chair. They fully open, will not close by themselves and actually need adult strength to get them to close.
customer_reviews.author: M. Gillespie

customer_reviews.title: Received damaged- Cute- Ages 2-7
customer_reviews.text: We received this table with damaged packaging- It has clearly been re packaged. The chair was in new condition but the table top was scratched and the finish was chipped off in a gouge almost in the middle. My kids will have to be aware of the groove while the do their work. I’m hoping to get a replacement. Overall, if it wasn’t damaged the item is nice. It’s a bit smaller than I imagined. Ages 2-7 would be best suited. Averaged sized kids.
customer_reviews.author: PT

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive photo. Lower to floor than it appears on photo.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Lower than expected. I will likely give it away and purchase something else.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Taybron

customer_reviews.title: She loves her table
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my cousins little girl for Christmas and now she won’t let us put it up. She eats here plays and everything else. When we take it down to clean up she goes and pulls it out and says no my table and we have to put it back up. As you see this is here area lol.
customer_reviews.author: George hammonds

customer_reviews.title: Really Small!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my 9 year old but when we got it, we realized right away that it was way too small for her and would have to give it to my 6 year old instead. I think the range for this table and chair set would be between 3 and 6 years old (MAX). At least the desk has decent space to write on.
customer_reviews.author: lotusbee4

customer_reviews.title: I think it was a good buy.
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old grandson uses this in his very cramped room he shares. Fits him good. It’s lightweight and can be moved around or stored easily. It feels sturdy but it’s not made for older kids or standing on. I would have preferred one color or more neutrals. But at least it wasn’t bright red, blue, yellow and green.
customer_reviews.author: Siricakes

customer_reviews.title: Blotchy spot
customer_reviews.text: I received this product 10 mins ago, so I can't yet speak on the sturdiness but there was a blotchy spot in the front of the table that seemed to be missed during the spray painting process.
customer_reviews.author: WestPhillySmizz

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup
customer_reviews.text: I liked the item came right away. Its already completely assembled out the box. The chair folds down and the table snaps into place. No tools needed. Took 30 seconds out of the box. Chair is padded and table very sturdy. I bought it for my 20 month grandson and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffani

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been using this for our 6yr old during the quarantine and it works great. Easy to store and move around as needed.
customer_reviews.author: BlackPearl

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: I was sent the wrong item from Amazon. When I went to reorder, it was not available for the same price. I did find it on another site and ordered it. I'm glad I did. It looks very nice and is very sturdy. I'm glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Maneri

customer_reviews.title: Durable, Aesthetic
customer_reviews.text: I love the simplicity of this. It was a perfect transition for our 3 year old from the baby seat to this. Easy to clean as well. Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: EuroGal

customer_reviews.title: My son and grandson both love their table and chair
customer_reviews.text: My son and grandson both love their table and chair. I like that the table has a hard surface so they kids are not able to poke holes in it.
customer_reviews.author: Candice Veale

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations! A great table & chair!
customer_reviews.text: The table and chair are both solid & sturdy and looks to be very durable. Perfect for my 3 year old grandson with plenty of room to grow. I would highly recommend this table and chair. A high quality set at a bargain price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cote

customer_reviews.title: Worth it but be careful
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy only thing i wish the grip at the bottom the both chair and table were a bit better because it just slides around on tile
customer_reviews.author: Duttchess

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for toddlers.
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these and we use them for everything drawing, eating puzzles you name it! Great quality great price.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: It was a great price and both the table and chair are very ...
customer_reviews.text: I bring my 5 year old to my office often, so I purchased this table and chair so she could have her own work space. It was a great price and both the table and chair are very durable and made of quality material.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grand daughter recognizes it is her tables
customer_reviews.text: Liked all the above. Use as breakdast lunch table as well as activity table.
customer_reviews.author: loved them ang happy they were boxed. my granddau will love them. she drinks her leftover milk😁

customer_reviews.title: Just as shown, good price too.
customer_reviews.text: Kids desk or activity table. Good quality, folds nicely for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Product is just as described. The table and chair are well made, sturdy, easy to open and close and store in a small space.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria L.

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased one for my daughter and she loved it! Had to also eventually purchase another set for my son (he wanted his own). Easy to clean and easy to fold/store. Arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Redwood

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and durable
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure if the quality of the chair cover has anything to do with it, but my 1yr old was able to bite the material, ripping it. Overall, great item that is serving its purpose for homeschool, very sturdy to even support adult weight and easy to store or blend in with the rest of the furniture in home.
customer_reviews.author: MagsAnon

customer_reviews.title: Best purchased this year
customer_reviews.text: My son Love's this!I love that it will fit him up for a while and it's the perfect size for him.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Very durable and well made. Very easy to use and on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett M

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a set my toddler could use that wouldn't take up to much space. This was perfect. It doesn't feel cheap or unstable.
customer_reviews.author: Toya Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Returned it cause it was too small for my 7 year old
customer_reviews.author: SuzieQ

customer_reviews.title: Costco table and chair
customer_reviews.text: The table and chair are great for little ones. They fit perfectly. The product is well made.
customer_reviews.author: Starrynite20121

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: This table/chair set arrived as advertised. They are sturdy and good quality. I would recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Grace W.

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: I love it the fact that the chair is cushioned. My son loves the colors.. And the size of the table is just perfect .
customer_reviews.author: Niagru

customer_reviews.title: Stability
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his table. He eats at it, colors and does homework on it. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Product review
customer_reviews.text: I buy it for my son. But it's a little bit small to my son. And the cost-effective is not very high.
customer_reviews.author: Matthewzeng

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, sturdy quality little desk. It can sit toddlers up to pre teens. We use it as a homework desk.
customer_reviews.author: BASIL WHITE

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: This desk is perfect. Easy to store, light weight to move when needed and easy to clean surface.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, my son likes it so far he fits in it perfectly and he’s 5 years old. Good buy .
customer_reviews.author: Angelina parra

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It's just perfect for my 2 1/2 year old grand baby, to eat at, play her games, colors and be on her tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it's compact and easy to fold up
customer_reviews.text: It's cute, it's compact and easy to fold up, it's the perfect size for my two-year-old.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Aponte

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love that when it’s not needed I can fold it and put it away. My child has loved using it for his homework and art activities. He’s 4ft tall and he fits perfectly fine in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly sturdy well made for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly sturdy well made for the price. Perfect little crafting table for in her mommies sewing room. Folds up and easy to store or take with on an outing.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Great product but recieved it damaged
customer_reviews.text: The chair and table are great. Comfortable and durable for my daughter to use when she's at my office. I was just disappointed that the table was damaged when we received it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in my son’s room. It’s compact and stable with a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Jackson

product_meta.title: COSCO Kids 2pc Activity, Table and Chair, Orange Chair, Blue Table
product_meta.description: Cosco kids 2Pc activity set includes 1 table and 1 pinch free chair. This activity set is just the right size for coloring, crafts, games, and snacks. Set your mind at ease knowing your child is using a pinch free folding chair and will be safe when is use or folding. The table features a durable, easy to clean PVC top with non marring foot caps. The Cosco kids 2Pc activity set will provide your child a safe space to create and learn.
feature_bullets: Polypropylene table Top: chalk friendly, easy to clean and low maintenance
Folding chair and table: easy to transport and Simple to store
Rubber Leg tips: non-marring, prevents slipping and protects surfaces
One box shipment: standard parcel shipment

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars86 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
